description: Conflicting: 5 commits where two have contradictory messages about the same feature. One commit adds streaming response support and a later commit reverts it, creating ambiguity about final state.

commits.message: Add streaming response support to KLlama backend
Wire streaming callback into MCP server SSE transport
Revert streaming response support in KLlama backend due to memory leak
Add memory profiling hooks to LLMService for leak detection
Update CHANGELOG with note about deferred streaming feature

summary.notes: Model must acknowledge the add-then-revert cycle. Should note that streaming was attempted and reverted due to a memory leak. Blocker section should mention the memory leak issue. Must not present streaming as a completed feature.

json.notes: The revert should appear as a bug fix or be clearly linked to the original feature. Memory profiling is a feature/tooling addition. CHANGELOG is documentation.
